title: Dont let new champions queue up ranked for a while
body: Im sick of losing matches becuase we have the new champ on our team and they suck a dick. Force players to learn them in normal by not letting them play them immediately in ranked. Its super annoying.

replies.body:
I've been saying for awhile now that new champions/reworks should be blocked from ranked until 1 week after release.
It gives people plenty of time to learn her, and if you only play ranked then oh well.
I'm sick of losing matches becuase we have a champ on our team and they suck. Doesn't mean they should be banned.

How does this differ from having some one on your team playing an old champ that they "suck a dick" with and lose you the match. Odds are same for your team and enemy team to get an instalock unless if you main the same role the new champ is. Then you get a huge advantage dunning new champ releases, so use it to climb. Last bit now, post on your main account mate. I am not judging the silver 5 but you playing only ARAMs kind of makes it difficult for me to take you seriously when your complaining about SR balance.
